findings.title: TRANSITIVE TRUST ABUSE detected by YARA
findings.description: Detects skills that delegate trust to untrusted external content: run scripts
findings.snippet: **Always run scripts with `--help` first** to see usage. DO NOT read the source until you try running the script first and find that a customized solution is abslutely necessary. These scripts can be very large and thus pollute your context window. They exist to be called directly as black-box scripts rather than ingested into your context window.
findings.remediation: Review and remove transitive trust abuse pattern
